name: Rewind Sticks
description:
Rewind Sticks entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2  Theme: Rewind

Remember pick up sticks that you play during your childhood? if you don't remember it, it's fine. the game is too simple the colorful sticks will fall and you have to pick it up one by one but this time using a rewind mechanic. be careful when picking up the stick , if you made a SIGNIFICANT  MOVEMENT, you will fail the level.

TIP:  please try it with FULL SCREEN mode

That's it,  PLEASE try to PLAY this game (Rewind Sticks)  and give us your RATINGS and FEED BACK

Thank you for visiting and trying our entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Theme: Rewind

CONTROLS:
Mouse Left click for selecting the stick
Mouse Wheel for rotating Around

P.S. sorry for the lousy game, i didn't have enough time to make a polish and solid game but hey, i finish and complete it on schedule and that's something.

BTW we have a YouTube Channel that focuses on Unity3D Tutorial for beginners, if you are interested please check it. https://www.youtube.com/c/makinggameswithunity/
